output_list.reason: The mintToken function has an integer overflow vulnerability in the mintedAmount addition, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens.

The transfer function has a wrong logic in the balanceOf[_to] += _value; statement, allowing a user to transfer tokens to a contract that does not implement a receive() function, causing a loss of tokens.

The transferFrom function has a wrong logic in the balanceOf[_to] += _value; statement, allowing a user to transfer tokens to a contract that does not implement a receive() function, causing a loss of tokens.
The toOwner function does not check if the caller is the owner, allowing any user to claim ownership and withdraw funds.
The buy function has an integer overflow vulnerability in the msg.value * buyRate; multiplication, allowing the owner to buy an arbitrary large amount of tokens.
